name: e-commerce-mvp
description: E-commerce MVP project with frontend and backend

scripts.build: pnpm --filter backend build && pnpm --filter frontend build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter backend clean && pnpm --filter frontend clean
scripts.backend:dev:sqlite: cd backend && DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=./database.sqlite JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key PORT=3001 pnpm run dev
scripts.backend:dev:mysql: cd backend && pnpm run mysql:up && sleep 5 && DB_DIALECT=mysql DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=3306 DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=password DB_DATABASE=ecommerce JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key PORT=3001 pnpm run dev
scripts.backend:start:sqlite: cd backend && DB_DIALECT=sqlite DB_STORAGE=./database.sqlite JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key PORT=3001 pnpm run start:prod
scripts.backend:start:mysql: cd backend && pnpm run mysql:up && sleep 5 && DB_DIALECT=mysql DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=3306 DB_USERNAME=root DB_PASSWORD=password DB_DATABASE=ecommerce JWT_SECRET=your_jwt_secret_key PORT=3001 pnpm run start:prod
